transforms.name: vite:load-fallback
vite:css
transforms.result: @import url("https://unpkg.com/modern-css-reset/dist/reset.min.css");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+JP:wght@100..900&family=Noto+Serif+Display:ital,wght@0,100..900;1,100..900&family=Open+Sans:ital,wght@0,300..800;1,300..800&display=swap");html{background-color:#000;color:#fff;font-family:Open Sans,Noto Sans JP,sans-serif;font-size:10px;font-weight:300;scroll-behavior:smooth;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none}html::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}body{width:100vw}div.container{min-height:100vh;overflow-x:hidden;position:relative;width:100%;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none;transition:.5s}div.container::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}div.container.move{transform:translateY(30rem)}#mouse-stalker{background-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;height:20px;left:-10px;mix-blend-mode:difference;pointer-events:none;position:fixed;top:-10px;transform:translate(0);transition:transform .2s;transition-timing-function:ease-out;width:20px;z-index:999}@media (hover:none){#mouse-stalker{display:none}}div.wrapper{margin:auto;width:95%}header{align-items:start;background-color:#000;display:flex;padding-top:3rem;width:100%}div.alt-header,header{height:12rem}div.updated{font-size:2rem;order:0;text-align:left}div#menu{cursor:pointer;font-size:2rem;order:2;position:relative;text-align:right}div#menu:before{background-color:#fff;bottom:0;content:"";height:1px;position:absolute;transform:scaleX(0);transform-origin:right top;transition:transform .5s;width:100%}div#menu.active:before{transform:scaleX(1);transform-origin:left top}@media (hover:hover){div#menu:hover:before{transform:scaleX(1);transform-origin:left top}}li.menu-content{cursor:pointer;font-size:2rem;list-style:none;position:relative;position:absolute;right:-50%;text-align:right;transition:.5s}li.menu-content a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none}@media (hover:hover){li.menu-content:hover{list-style:disc}}li.menu-content:first-of-type{top:6rem}li.menu-content:nth-of-type(2){top:8.5rem;transition-delay:.1s}li.menu-content:nth-of-type(3){top:11rem;transition-delay:.2s}li.menu-content.active{right:2.5%}div#menu-for-sp{border-bottom:.5px solid #777;display:grid;font-size:3rem;height:30rem;padding:3rem 0;place-items:center;position:absolute;text-align:center;top:-50%;transition:.5s;width:100%}div#menu-for-sp.active{top:0}div#menu-for-sp ul{padding-left:0;width:100%}div#menu-for-sp li{border-bottom:1px solid #fff;list-style:none;margin:auto;padding-top:2rem;width:80%}@media screen and (min-width:601px){div.menu-for-sp{display:none}}@media screen and (max-width:600px){li.menu-content{display:none}}div.site-title{cursor:pointer;flex-grow:1;font-size:4rem;line-height:100%;order:1;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap}div.site-title span{font-size:3rem}@media screen and (max-width:450px){div.site-title{font-size:3.5rem}div.site-title span{font-size:2.4rem}}a{color:#00dc82}footer{font-size:1.6rem;margin-top:5rem;padding:5rem;text-align:center}dt.github-url{margin-top:2rem}@media screen and (max-width:800px){html{font-size:8px}}@media screen and (max-width:600px){div.wrapper{width:90%}header{display:block}div.alt-header{display:none}div.updated{margin-top:3rem}div#menu{margin-left:auto;margin-top:-6rem;width:-moz-min-content;width:min-content}}
